review: My husband had been to hospital and it was for heart related checkup. ********* *** **** ** ******. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Doctor spoke well patiently for 30 minutes. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was some waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good.

Doctor was well behaved, soft spoken person. Identifying the problem and diagnosing the issue was commendable.
No unnecessary tests, no unwanted medicines. Really good doctor. I can highly recommend this doctor for anybody.
The doctor consultation was great. However, the fees was Rs.1000/- (even for previously registered Apollo patient)and not Rs.700/- as mentioned by practo.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very satisfied. Explained in detail about the process and the findings. I would recommend the doctor.

My mom had visited the hospital and it was wheezing problem. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. There was some disturbance in covid time. My mom felt upset. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. ECG, blood test, X-ray was done. There was waiting time in the hospital. It was for 30 minutes. Doctor was friendly. She is ok now.
Doctor was very friendly but waited for one hour thank you practo for booking the appointment last time it went good but this time we consulted the doctor late after one hour only
Dr. Shanmugasundaram wasn't available so I visited Dr. Guru Prasad Sogunuru. He is good observer and listener.

Very good,  efficient...

On time appointment, no unnecessary medications ad checked echo and results personally

Dr Shanmugasundaram  a wonderful doctor  , friendly and keep the patient very comfortable.  He doesn't frighten the patient,  very understanding.  All told a nice experience.  We want more doctors like him
he was very polite and also he understand the problem and give the beat solution. I will recommend this doctor
